chain 5 counts as double_crochet & chain 2 1 double_crochet into same stitches of the next round are worked over elastic space as joining skip 1 st double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next and into the stitches of round 12 stitch skip 1 stitch x 47 51 55 59 63 67 71 75 join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of starting chain 5 round 13 -
